snippet: In an ideal system, the mentally ill who commit minor offenses and pose no real danger to the public would never see the inside of a jail.
abstract: Editorial praises New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg for starting corrections initiative focused on mentally ill offenders; holds that in an ideal system, mentally ill who commit minor offenses and pose no danger to public should receive treatment rather than jail sentence.
lead_paragraph: In an ideal system, the mentally ill who commit minor offenses and pose no real danger to the public would never see the inside of a jail.
